channel.title: Right Clicking, ipban admin+ banuser mod+ kick user mod+? how can i do this?
channel.description: Hello, well I get alot of massers and people that like to go invisible and stuff on my server, and everytime I want to ip ban them I have to goto the files and get there ip then put it in the banips, is there anyway I can just add a Kick-Ban-Ipban when I right click a player?, I also want it to be mod+, but for ip ban admin+. Thanks!

item.title: Right Clicking, ipban admin+ banuser mod+ kick user mod+? how can i do this?
item.dc:creator: @PLAYTIME PLAYTIME
item.description:
@PLAYTIME wrote:

delta:

You’d probably have to remove 2 options of your right clicking though

I know[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2007, 09:48:21 AM[/size][hr][quote=“delta, post:10, topic:168954”]Not on all sources there isn’t[/quote]
Um anybody :O?

Read full topic

item.title: Right Clicking, ipban admin+ banuser mod+ kick user mod+? how can i do this?
item.dc:creator: @PLAYTIME PLAYTIME
item.description:
@PLAYTIME wrote:

[quote=“delta, post:6, topic:168954”]Lol if your ipban doesn’t work your ipban right click won’t work you need the method for appendtoIpBan and the checkipbanned so they can’t log in[/quote]ok… can I get the kick and ban ones?

Read full topic

item.title: Right Clicking, ipban admin+ banuser mod+ kick user mod+? how can i do this?
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Lol if your ipban doesn’t work your ipban right click won’t work you need the method for appendtoIpBan and the checkipbanned so they can’t log in

Read full topic
item.source: Right Clicking, ipban admin+ banuser mod+ kick user mod+? how can i do this?

item.title: Right Clicking, ipban admin+ banuser mod+ kick user mod+? how can i do this?
item.dc:creator: @PLAYTIME PLAYTIME
item.description:
@PLAYTIME wrote:

[quote=“delta, post:2, topic:168954”]If you do that you’re gonna have to remove you’re attack trade duel stats right click options because theres not gonna be enough room
or did you not understand that like my other posts you ignore them all[/quote]
No I don’t ^^ I didn’t understand them. I can remove the lick one and stats, so can you give me the um, kick and ban?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2007, 06:57:15 PM[/size][hr][quote=“delta, post:4, topic:168954”]Ah thats too much to type he can’t handle that many[/quote]Acutally I can, my ipban doesn’t work.

Read full topic
